summary: Calibration PDF Report generation tested and verified. All 16 backend tests passed. The Calibration PDF now matches the AMC PDF structure exactly.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data: test-cal-001 (calibration contract), test-amc-001 (AMC contract)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Calibration PDF Report endpoint at /api/calibration-report/{contract_id}/report-pdf is fully functional and matches AMC PDF structure. Test contract ID: test-cal-001. AMC reference ID: test-amc-001.

pdf_structure_tests.pages_2_plus_have_header: PASS - Header with report title and number
pdf_structure_tests.pages_2_plus_have_footer: PASS - Footer with company and website
pdf_structure_tests.back_cover_no_header_footer: PASS - No header/footer on back cover

amc_comparison_tests.both_cover_pages_match: PASS - Same structure (Submitted By, CUSTOMER, LOCATION)

verified_requirements.cover_page_with_decorative_curves: VERIFIED - Cover page has orange gradient curves (top-right and bottom-left)
verified_requirements.cover_page_info_box: VERIFIED - Customer info box with CUSTOMER, LOCATION, CONTRACT NO, CONTRACT PERIOD
verified_requirements.cover_page_footer: VERIFIED - 'Submitted By' section with company details
verified_requirements.header_footer_on_pages_2_plus: VERIFIED - All content pages have header (report title, report no) and footer (company, website, page number)
verified_requirements.back_cover_no_header_footer: VERIFIED - Back cover only has 'Contact Us' section without header/footer
verified_requirements.toc_says_contents: VERIFIED - TOC header says 'CONTENTS' not 'TABLE OF CONTENTS'
